bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>ğŸ› Bug</denchmark-h>
In my case, the inducing points have the dimension as torch.Size([10, 50, 4]) where 10 is the number of inducing points, 4 is the input channels and 50 is the number input sequences. so the model would be output(1x3) = model(intput(50x4)) however, in variational_strategy.py line 86: full_inputs = torch.cat([inducing_points, x], dim=-2) line 91: num_induc = inducing_points.size(-2) In my case, the dimension -2 is not the number of inducing point. Thank you and looking forward to your reply.
